name: Passionaries' Palace
uniques: Gain a free [Food Store] [in this city]
Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
quote: Now I turn to the most worthy of the worthy. Carry the will of Eurasia with pen and sword and work for our common good.

civilopediaText.text: Now I turn to the most worthy of the worthy. Carry the will of Eurasia with pen and sword and work for our common good.

name: Subpassional quarter
uniques: Remove extra unhappiness from annexed cities
Destroyed when the city is captured
